title: Michal Beneš
text: Michal Beneš (born 26 November 1967) is a former <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Referee%20%28association%20football%29">referee</a>. He was a full international for <a href="FIFA">FIFA</a> since 1999. He was appointed on <a href="2001%20FIFA%20U-17%20World%20Championship">2001 FIFA U-17 World Championship</a> and refereed some <a href="UEFA%20Champions%20League">UEFA Champions League</a> matches.
